attributes.action: Allow Donald Trump to make a State Visit to the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: The UK is a democratic country and everyone is entitled to an opinion. There is substantial support to prevent Donald Trump from entering the UK, but many may feel that this is not their opinion. This petition is simply to allow those with different views to have their, as this is the beauty of democracy.
attributes.background: Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK as head of the US Government, and should be invited to make an official State Visit with Her Majesty the Queen.
